  @verbatim
  ******************************************************************************
  * @file    st_readme.txt
  * @author  SRA
  * @brief   This file lists the main modification done by STMicroelectronics
  *          on libsodium (required by iota.c) for integration with
  *          STM32Cube solution.
  ******************************************************************************
  *
  * original licensing conditions
  * as issued by SPDX-License-Identifier: ISC
  *
  ******************************************************************************
  @endverbatim

=======
### 10-March-2021 ###
========================
   + libsodium v1.0.18 (https://download.libsodium.org/libsodium/releases/)
   + (https://github.com/jedisct1/libsodium) customized and precompiled 
   + version for STM32Cube solution.

 * <h3><center>&copy; COPYRIGHT STMicroelectronics</center></h3>
 */
